section.heading: Governing law.
section.text: The law of the District shall govern:

para.text: The internal affairs of a limited liability company; and
The liability of a member as member and a manager as manager for the debts, obligations, or other liabilities of a limited liability company.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 106 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
